name: What's your lifetime value?
description: Modern life is hard and complicated – so many options, so little time! Invest your lifetime in the right choices and beat the highscore by leading the most successful life. You do so by choosing actions at every age that make you succeed in different areas:  Start as a toddler facing the existential question whether to eat your vegetables or not, daydream as a child, survive puberty with the aid of emo music and have a career without burnout. Every age brings in new needs and desires, and you cannot fulfill them all - or can you?
